EmailTemplate.subject: Save The Date! Come Hear What’s in Store for NCR Freshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We are pleased to invite you to our annual NCR Freshop Community Meeting on the first morning of the 2021 NGA show in Las Vegas. We are excited to share more about our new partnership with NCR with you! Join us to hear from our industry-leading professionals as they discuss NCR Innovation, NCR Retail Architecture and what you have to look forward to from our NCR Freshop Solution Roadmap. Come ready to gain new insights and hear from other retailers who are live on NCR Freshop today. You won’t want to miss it! Are you able to join us?
